scripts.build: tsc && tsc-alias -f && node -e "const fs=require('fs'),path=require('path');const migrateSrc='src/db/migrate.mjs';const migrateDest='dist/db/migrate.js';fs.mkdirSync(path.dirname(migrateDest),{recursive:true});fs.copyFileSync(migrateSrc,migrateDest);console.log('Copied migrate script to',migrateDest);const migrationsSrc='src/migrations';const migrationsDest='dist/migrations';if(fs.existsSync(migrationsSrc)){fs.mkdirSync(migrationsDest,{recursive:true});fs.cpSync(migrationsSrc,migrationsDest,{recursive:true,force:true});console.log('Copied migrations folder to',migrationsDest);}else{console.log('No migrations folder found, skipping copy');}"
